snippet.title: 14 Minutes of 'Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice' VR Gameplay
snippet.description:
Ninja Theory, the minds behind BAFTA award-winning action-adventure game Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice (2017), are bringing the full, uncut game to Oculus Rift and HTC Vive headsets soon. We got an exclusive first look at the game’s new VR mode, which is coming free to all owners of the PC game when the update goes live on Steam July 31st. Read the exclusive hands-on here: http://ow.ly/HyC530l70lC

--
